Power Vinyasa Yoga

Learn Power Vinyasa yoga in Bali

Power Vinyasa Bali

Your local friend:

Amaranta

About:

Amaranta is a professional yoga teacher based in bali, Indonesia. Hailing from Mexico, Amaranta has called Bali her home for the past 3 years. Her passion is Vinyasa power yoga.

Course Details:

Location: Bali, Indonesia

Duration: 1 day

Level:

Price: $100 USD

What you'll learn:

Learn the basics of Power Vinyasa yoga and how to keep practicing on your own.

Where we'll be:

Bali around Canggu, rice fields and Eco beach.

What I'll provide:

I can use my camera or you can bring yours and also we can edit in my lightroom if you don't have one set up yet.

Good to know

Make sure you have enough space on your laptop to install lightroom if you want to do that and also space on your memory card to take photos.

Where we'll meet:
